testSteps.description: [1] {submenuText=Credit Management, menuText=Accounting, validCustomerCode=a567, rowIndex=0, surveySelect=Survey institute and information source, indexAccounting=Index for accounting system, valueSurvey=帝国データ, valueIndexAccounting=12, btnEdit=Edit, creditScore=Credit score number, valueCreditScore=10, tradingCondition=Trading condition category, valueTrading=通常取引, zipCode=Zip code of HQ, valueZipCode=111-1111, address=Address of HQ (all), tel=Tel., valueTel=023-345-3212, fiscal=Fiscal closing month, valueFiscal=01月, tabBussi=Business factors, btnApprove=Approve, successSave=Save successfully, btnDuplicate=Duplicate, btnSaveDraft=Save draft, tabIndustry=Industry classification, btnGenerate=Generate in input customer data, tabInputCustomer=Input customer data, textInput=name1,name2, typeInput=Provider, number=4009912, string=123456, lang=en}

children.description: When I open Login page
And I input my credentials username 4009912 and password 123456
And I change language to en
And I open submenu Credit Management of menu Accounting
And I search customer by code a567
And I click checkbox left of a row 0 into table result
And In accounting screen, I click button select
And In Credit Management page, I click record 0 in table Credit History in bottom with View enable
And In Credit Management page, I click button Duplicate
And In Credit Management page, I change survey date to next day of selected record
And In Credit Management page, I click button Save draft
And I open submenu Credit Management of menu Accounting
And I search customer by code a567
And I click checkbox left of a row 0 into table result
And In accounting screen, I click button select
And In Credit Management page, I click record 0 in table Credit History in bottom
And In Credit Management page, I click button Edit
And In Credit Management page, I select in Survey institute and information source is 帝国データ
And In Credit Management page, I change survey date to next day of selected record
And In Credit Management page, I type in Index for accounting system is 12
And In Credit Management page, I type in Credit score number is 10
And In Credit Management page, I select in Trading condition category is 通常取引

And In Credit Management page, textarea can input
| Cause of decision |
| Additional direction |
| Accountant direction |
And In Credit Management page, I select tab have name is Business factors
And In Credit Management page, I type in Zip code of HQ is 111-1111
And In Credit Management page, I type in Address of HQ (all) is 111-1111
And In Credit Management page, I type in Tel. is 023-345-3212
And In Credit Management page, I select in Fiscal closing month is 01月

And In Credit Management page, fields not required can input
| Company index of research institute |
| Fax. |
| Number of employees |
| Capital fund |
| Url |
And In Credit Management page, I select tab have name is Industry classification

And In Credit Management page, fields required can input
| Industry category code (main) |
| Industry category code (subsidiary) |

And In Credit Management page, fields not required can input
| Rank of the same sector (Nation wide) |
| Population of the same industry (Nation wide) |
| Rank of the same sector (Prefecture) |
| Population of the same industry (Prefecture) |
And In Credit Management page, I select tab have name is Input customer data
And In Credit Management page, I type name1,name2 in Input related company and choose type is Provider
And In Credit Management page, I click button Generate in input customer data
And In Credit Management page, I click button Approve
And In Credit Management page, I confirm action
Then In Credit Management page, System show message Save successfully
And I logout from system

userStory.narrative:
As a user
I want use Credit management

tags.name: Credit management/Credit management add and edit
